ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... um, 90 minute refresh time for HT vs 40 minute for DDD. ... i don t believe i said outdamage, i believe i said damage per second.  if i did say outdamage,
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:58 PM 3/1/01 -0500, you wrote:
>um, 433 damage, for 2 targets = 866 damage. which is well short of 1400
>damage.

um, 90 minute refresh time for HT vs 40 minute for DDD.


>3 targets = 1299 damage
>4 targets = 1732 damage
>
>So basically you need to land this on 4 targets with no resists to outdamage
>the Shadowknight.

i don't believe i said outdamage, i believe i said damage per second. if i did say
outdamage, i misspoke.


>If you're fighting 4 targets, there's no way in hell you're gonna be using
>this song. You're gonna be mezzing or let the enchanter mez. And if you
>break 3 mezzes, he's gonna be mighty pissed at you.

so you can't shoot this off before he mezzes things? have the puller targetted
and start the song off as soon as the puller gets in range. i would guess that
your song will go off 100% of the time before the enchanter would get a mez
off in that situation.


>Still think it's so useful?

i still think it is an option if you can't figure out anything else to do.


>Draelon Stormsong
